definitions.definition: to talk about or look at someone or something in an unkind way that shows you do not respect or approve of him, her, or it:
examples: You may sneer, but a lot of people like this kind of music.

definitions.definition: an unkind expression on your face that shows you do not respect or approve of someone or something:
examples: "How much did you say you earned last year?" she said with a sneer.
